full_summary:
===============

### Tender Announcement for Meter Flow Rate Indicating Items

**Reference Number:** W8482-242335/A

**Publication Date:** November 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2023, 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the supply of meter flow rate indicating items. The delivery locations for these items are:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Description of Items:**

The Department is seeking the following items:

* Meter, Flow Rate Indicating (Item 1, NATO Stock Number (NSN) 21-909-6998)
* Meter, Flow Rate Indicating (Item 2, NSN 21-909-6998)

**Selection Criteria:**

The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Suppliers must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and National Company Identification (NCAGE) number for any equivalent or substitute products.

**Note:**

* Bids submitted in foreign currency will not be accepted.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers regarding procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Bidder Requirements:

* Suppliers must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must provide the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE number.
* The Department will not consider bids submitted in currencies other than Canadian dollars.

### Contact Information:

* For more information, please contact: Anthony Lemoine-Hoefsmit at (819) 939-3725 or Anthony.Lemoine-Hoefsmit@forces.gc.ca.

### Attachments:

The complete tender documentation, including clauses and conditions, can be accessed on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24960/w8482-242335---english-rfp-clauses.pdf). The French version is available at [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24960/w8482-242335---french-rfp-clauses.pdf).  To access these attachments, please note the following: 

* _Trade Agreements:_ This procurement is open to suppliers from the countries mentioned in the Annex.
